title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Park Fun
body: Park Fun      Â      Children learn about the Lenape Indians who inhabitated the Upper Delaware Valley. National Park Service  Here at the Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River we strive to make our educational programs fun! From making neat arts and crafts to tracking animals down by the river to traveling to far off places through literature. Click on the links above to learn more about our programs.
